thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 30 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Illumina Q4 GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.46

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Illumina Q4 GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.46
text:
Jan 30 (Reuters) - Illumina Inc:
* ILLUMINA REPORTS FINANCIAL RESULTS FOR FOURTH QUARTER AND FISCAL YEAR 2017
* Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.44 * Q4 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.46 * Q4 REVENUE $778 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $735.5 MILLION
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.18 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SAYS ‍FOR FISCAL 2018, COMPANY IS PROJECTING 13% TO 14% REVENUE GROWTH​
* SEES FY 2018 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE ATTRIBUTABLE TO ILLUMINA STOCKHOLDERS OF $4.14 TO $4.24
* SEES FY 2018 ‍NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE ATTRIBUTABLE TO ILLUMINA STOCKHOLDERS OF $4.50 TO $4.60​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
